item.title: Stellantis 就罢工威胁向美国联邦法院起诉 UAW
item.description: 汽车制造商 Stellantis 在加利福尼亚州联邦法院对美国汽车工人联合会提起诉讼，声称该工会围绕可能的罢工采取的行动是非法的。【原文：Automaker Stellantis has filed a lawsuit against the United Auto Workers in federal court in California, claiming the union's actions around possible strikes illegal.】

item.title: 美国最高法院将裁定白人、异性恋工人在偏见诉讼中是否面临更高的门槛
item.description: 美国最高法院周五同意就是否应让来自 "多数背景"（如白人或异性恋者）的工人更难证明工作场所歧视索赔做出裁决。【原文：The U.S. Supreme Court agreed on Friday to decide whether it should be more difficult for workers from "majority backgrounds," such as white or heterosexual people, to prove workplace discrimination claims.】

item.title: 美国港口罢工达成和解，供应链可能保持平静
item.description: 美国港口工人罢工的解决可能会使纽约联储跟踪的全球供应链压力保持平静，并促使通胀趋势降温。【原文：The resolution of a U.S. port worker strike is likely to keep the global supply chain pressures tracked by the New York Fed on a calm footing and contributing to cooling inflation trends.】

item.title: 独家报道保守派智库盯上美国国家航空航天局（NASA）员工有关马斯克和特朗普的通讯内容
item.description: 据路透社查阅的联邦记录显示，一家有影响力的保守派智库已要求美国国家航空航天局（National Aeronautics and Space Administration）披露员工在内部讨论亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）和前总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的内容。【原文：An influential conservative think tank has asked the National Aeronautics and Space Administration to disclose what employees are discussing internally about billionaire Elon Musk and former President Donald Trump, according to federal records reviewed by Reuters.】

item.title: H&M 将在 2025 年底前逐步淘汰原生羽绒服
item.description: 瑞典服装零售商H&M周五表示，计划逐步停止使用原生羽绒和羽毛--这些材料从鸭和鹅身上采集，用于制作气泡夹克、枕头和其他产品。【原文：Swedish clothing retailer H&M said on Friday it plans to phase out its use of virgin down and feathers - materials that are harvested from ducks and geese and used in puffer jackets, pillows and other items.】

item.title: Stellantis 的 UAW 工人投票支持洛杉矶零部件中心的罢工授权
item.description: 联合汽车工人工会周五表示，如果汽车制造商未能解决与工会在美国投资问题上的不满，Stellantis 洛杉矶零部件配送中心的成员投票赞成授权罢工。【原文：The United Auto Workers union said on Friday that members at Stellantis' Los Angeles parts distribution center voted in favor of authorizing a strike if the carmaker failed to settle grievances with the union over investments in the U.S.】

item.title: 人工智能初创企业借助投资者热潮，2024 年将融资数十亿美元
item.description: OpenAI 最近以 1570 亿美元的估值完成了一轮 66 亿美元的融资，凸显了自 2022 年底推出 ChatGPT 以来，创业公司对人工智能生成技术的热情。【原文：OpenAI recently closed a $6.6 billion funding round at a $157 billion valuation that highlighted the enthusiasm around generative artificial-intelligence technology since the startup burst onto the scene with the launch of ChatGPT in late 2022.】

item.title: 谷歌测试搜索结果中的验证复选标记
item.description: Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司发言人周五表示，该公司正在测试在搜索结果中显示某些公司旁边的复选标记，此举旨在帮助用户识别经过验证的消息来源，避开虚假网站。【原文：Alphabet's Google is testing showing check marks next to certain companies on its search results, a company spokesperson said on Friday, in a move aimed at helping users identify verified sources and steer clear of fake websites.】

item.title: 华尔街未来一周 投资者期待盈利支撑股价创新高
item.description: 下周，高风险的企业财报季将拉开帷幕，看涨的投资者希望财报结果能证明美国股市接近历史高点的估值是合理的。【原文：A high-stakes corporate earnings season kicks into gear next week, with bullish investors hoping results will justify increasingly rich valuations in a U.S. stock market near record highs.】

item.title: 消息人士称，马斯克的 X 公司将在支付罚款后寻求恢复巴西服务
item.description: 周五，两位直接了解此事的消息人士称，埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）旗下的社交媒体平台X已经支付了巴西最高法院的部分罚款，并将重新申请恢复在巴西的服务。【原文：Elon Musk-owned social media platform X has paid some pending fines that had been imposed by Brazil's Supreme Court and will file a fresh request to resume services in the country, two sources with direct knowledge of the matter said on Friday.】

item.title: 印度 Jio Financial 和贝莱德获原则性批准建立共同基金业务
item.description: 穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）领导的信实集团公司周五表示，Jio Financial 和总部位于美国的贝莱德（BlackRock）获得了印度市场监管机构的原则性批准，将作为共同发起人在印度建立共同基金业务。【原文：Jio Financial and U.S.-based BlackRock got in-principle approval from India's markets regulator to act as co-sponsors and set up a mutual fund business in the country, the Mukesh Ambani-led Reliance Group company said on Friday.】

item.title: Facebook 试图通过新的社区和视频功能吸引年轻人
item.description: 最初的社交媒体网络之一 Facebook 已成为父母和祖父母的平台，而年轻人则开始使用 Instagram 和 TikTok 等照片和视频应用程序。【原文：Facebook, one of the original social media networks, has become known as the platform of parents and grandparents, while young adults take up photo and video apps like Instagram and TikTok.】

item.title: 受飓风海伦影响，通用汽车停止美国两家工厂的汽车生产
item.description: 通用汽车公司周五表示，由于飓风 "海伦 "对供应商造成的影响，该公司已暂时停止德克萨斯州和密歇根州两家装配厂的卡车和 SUV 生产。【原文：General Motors has temporarily halted truck and SUV production at two assembly plants in Texas and Michigan because of impacts to its suppliers due to Hurricane Helene, the automaker said Friday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，腾讯、Guillemot 家族正在酝酿收购《刺客信条》制造商育碧公司
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周五报道，腾讯控股和育碧娱乐的创始人吉尔莫家族正在考虑各种方案，包括可能收购《刺客信条》的制作商。【原文：Tencent Holdings and Ubisoft Entertainment's founding Guillemot family are considering options including a potential buyout of the "Assassin's Creed" maker, Bloomberg News reported on Friday.】

item.title: 裕信银行首席执行官告诉《经济学家》：德国商业银行任何合并中的成本削减都将影响总部而非分行
item.description: 周五援引联合信贷银行首席执行官 Andrea Orcel的话说，如果联合信贷银行收购其德国竞争对手，德国商业银行的成本削减将主要影响其总部，而不是其分支网络。【原文：Cost cuts at Commerzbank if UniCredit were to buy its German rival would mostly affect its head office not its branch network, UniCredit CEO Andrea Orcel was quoted as saying on Friday.】

item.title: GOP 首选银行 Chain Bridge 在纽交所首次亮相，估值 1.41 亿美元，表现平平
item.description: Chain Bridge Bancorp 是共和党的首选银行，周五在纽约证券交易所首次上市时，其股票开盘价与发行价一致，估值为 1.412 亿美元。【原文：Chain Bridge Bancorp , the Republican Party's top banking choice, was valued at $141.2 million after its shares opened in line with the offer price in their debut on the New York Stock Exchange on Friday.】

item.title: 波音-洛克希德合资公司的 "火神 "火箭执行第二次飞行任务
item.description: 波音公司和洛克希德-马丁公司的合资企业联合发射联盟周五表示，其 "火神 "火箭成功发射了第二次任务，这是获得五角大楼任务认证的关键一步。【原文：Boeing and Lockheed Martin's joint venture, United Launch Alliance, said on Friday its Vulcan rocket successfully launched its second mission, in what is a crucial step to receive certification for Pentagon missions.】

item.title: 收购报告发布后，育碧股价将创单日最大涨幅纪录
item.description: 据彭博社报道，大股东腾讯及其创始人吉尔莫家族正在考虑收购视频游戏制造商育碧，该公司股价周五大涨逾 30%。【原文：Shares in video game maker Ubisoft surged over 30% on Friday after Bloomberg reported that major shareholder Tencent and the Guillemot family, its founders, were considering a buyout of the company.】

item.title: WARN 通知显示通用电气航空航天公司将在斯克内克塔迪工厂裁员 70 多人
item.description: 通用电气航空航天公司周三在一份 "工人调整和再培训通知"（WARN）中称，该公司将在纽约州斯克内克塔迪工厂裁员 72 人。【原文：GE Aerospace is laying off 72 employees at its Schenectady site in New York state, the company said in a Worker Adjustment and Retraining Notification (WARN) notice on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美联储主席古尔斯比称就业报告 "极好"，仍认为未来会降息
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长奥斯坦-古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）周五称最新的就业市场报告 "极好"，并表示更多这样的报告将增强他对美国经济处于充分就业和低通胀状态的信心。【原文：Chicago Federal Reserve Bank President Austan Goolsbee on Friday called the latest job market report "superb" and said more such reports would boost his confidence the U.S. economy is at full employment, with low inflation.】

item.title: Coinbase 将在新法规出台前将部分稳定币在欧洲退市
item.description: 加密货币交易所 Coinbase 周五表示，该公司将在年底前将某些稳定币在欧洲经济区退市，因为该行业正在为该地区更严格的监管做准备。【原文：Coinbase will delist certain stablecoins in the European Economic Area by year's end, the cryptocurrency exchange said on Friday, as the industry braces for tougher regulation in the region.】

item.title: 美联储在美国就业数据强劲后被认为放缓了降息步伐
item.description: 交易员周五押注，上个月就业增长的激增将使美联储放弃进一步大幅降息，而坚持渐进式降息。【原文：A surge in job growth last month will allow the Federal Reserve to eschew any further big interest-rate reductions and stick to gradual cuts going forward, traders bet on Friday.】

item.title: Meta 向 OpenAI 发起挑战，宣布可生成有声视频的新型人工智能模型
item.description: Facebook 的所有者 Meta 周五宣布，它已经建立了一个名为 Movie Gen 的新人工智能模型，可以根据用户的提示创建逼真的视频和音频片段，并声称它可以与 OpenAI 和 ElevenLabs 等领先的媒体生成初创公司的工具相媲美。【原文：Facebook owner Meta announced on Friday it had built a new AI model called Movie Gen that can create realistic-seeming video and audio clips in response to user prompts, claiming it can rival tools from leading media generation startups like OpenAI and ElevenLabs.】

item.title: Tellurian股东支持提议的12亿美元伍德赛德交易
item.description: Tellurian公司周五表示，该公司股东已投票赞成澳大利亚能源生产商伍德赛德能源集团（Woodside Energy Group）以12亿美元收购美国液化天然气开发商的提议。【原文：Tellurian shareholders have voted in favor of the U.S. LNG developer's proposed $1.2 billion acquisition by Australian energy producer Woodside Energy Group , the company said on Friday.】

item.title: 强生公司终止登革热药物研究
item.description: 强生公司（Johnson & Johnson）周五表示，将终止对其预防登革热抗病毒候选药物疗效的中期实地研究。【原文：Johnson & Johnson said on Friday it will discontinue its mid-stage field study evaluating the efficacy of its antiviral drug candidate for the prevention of dengue.】

item.title: 美国 9 月非农就业人数跳升，11 月降息 50 个基点被取消
item.description: 美国 9 月份就业增长加速，失业率从 8 月份的 4.2% 下降到 4.1%，进一步降低了美联储在今年剩余两次会议上继续大幅降息的必要性。【原文：U.S. job growth accelerated in September and the unemployment rate slipped to 4.1% from August's 4.2%, further reducing the need for the Federal Reserve to maintain large interest rate cuts at its remaining two meetings this year.】

item.title: 美国 9 月份就业增长迅猛，失业率降至 4.1
item.description: 美国 9 月份就业增长加速，失业率降至 4.1%，进一步降低了美联储在今年剩余两次会议上维持大幅降息的必要性。【原文：U.S. job growth accelerated in September and the unemployment slipped to 4.1%, further reducing the need for the Federal Reserve to maintain large interest rate cuts at its remaining two meetings this year.】

item.title: 巴西 ClearSale 公司与 Experian 旗下 Serasa 公司达成合作协议
item.description: 巴西网络安全公司 ClearSale 周五表示，它已与当地 Experian 子公司 Serasa 达成合并协议，根据协议，其所有股份将由 Serasa Experian 纳入。【原文：Brazilian cyber security firm ClearSale said on Friday it has entered into a deal to combine with local Experian subsidiary Serasa under which all of its shares will be incorporated by Serasa Experian.】

item.title: 巴西对跨国公司利润征收最低税率
item.description: 巴西官方公报的一份出版物显示，巴西政府于周四晚些时候发布了一项行政命令，对跨国公司的利润征收最低 15%的税。【原文：Brazil's government late on Thursday published an executive order that effectively rolls out a minimum 15% tax on profits of multinational corporations, a publication in the country's official gazette showed.】

item.title: 中国快递公司 BingEx 在美国首次公开募股中估值近 12 亿美元
item.description: 中国的 BingEx 周五表示，它已在美国首次公开募股中募集到 6600 万美元，使这家快递公司的估值达到 11.7 亿美元，这表明投资者的风险偏好有所恢复，监管障碍也有所缓解。【原文：China's BingEx said on Friday it had raised $66 million in its U.S. initial public offering valuing the courier delivery firm at $1.17 billion, signaling a recovery in investors' risk appetite and easing regulatory hurdles.】
